title: regards to ranked promos
body: Hi there I just had a game where my team had not 1 but 2 afks, I was just wondering how that can still count as a loss and on promos? I thought that if the team was imbalanced there was a system which declared the game as a draw? Or at least the losing team didn't have to have a loss?

replies.body:
Hey **Illidanisdead**,

Unfortunately, loss prevented (or loss forgiven/compensation mode) cannot be retroactively applied to games in order to prevent abuse. As per the Riot Games Player Support article titled "[Loss Prevented](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753014-Loss-Prevented)", 

> This mode only activates when a large number of players are being impacted on a system-wide scale. We hit something we call "The Button" to activate it for the platform. Compensation Mode cannot be retroactively enabled or turned on for a player on an individual basis.
